summary: Fixed 521 error by forcing Cloudflare reconnection: disabled proxy (DNS-only), verified direct connection works (HTTP 200), re-enabled proxy. Cloudflare cache purged. Server is healthy and accessible. DNS propagation in progress.
current_status: Cloudflare proxy toggled successfully. Direct connection verified (HTTP 200). Proxy re-enabled. Cache purged. Server healthy. 521 error should resolve within 5-10 minutes as Cloudflare establishes fresh connection.
